entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. This call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Hi, I'd like to return a pair of cycling shoes and some tires I recently purchased.
Okay, I can help you with that. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you. I see the order here. Before we proceed with the return, I need to ask a few questions. Have the shoes been used at all? Were they perhaps... *mounted* on your bike pedals?
Yes, I did try them out. I even *installed* the *cleats* and went for a short ride. And the tires were also *mounted* on my wheels.
I understand. Unfortunately, because the shoes have *cleat marks* and the tires have been *mounted*, we *cannot resell* them as new. And *dirty tires* on top of that...
Oh, I see. So I can't return them?

Regrettably, no. Our return policy states that items must be returned in new, unused condition. Once shoes have been *mounted* and used, or tires have been *mounted* and especially with *dirty tires*, they are no longer eligible for return. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
Okay, I understand. I should have read the fine print. Thanks for your help.
You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
